backpropogate

public void backpropogate(java.util.List<StateActionPair> backupStatesPairs,
                          java.util.List<StateModel> backupStates,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Double> outcome)
Update every state visited in this path and update its average. Applying a discount factor to the result at every stage.

Parameters:
backupStatesPairs - the state pairs visited
backupStates - the states visited
outcome - the resulting reqard from the terminal state reach on rollout
